name: Frog Fling (SiTron)
description:
Fling yourself away through the sky! The higher you fly, the faster and more intense it gets. Avoid the eagles, and defeat the bosses. And unlock other frogs, to show them who's the best!

Features:
- Addicting gameplay that gets more difficult as you progress
- Lots of unlockable frogs
- Unlockable environments
- Challenges to complete
- Different bosses to defeat
- Simple and easy controls
- Pixel art graphics style

Download now for free, on Google Play!
